item.title: Build Blog With Hugo
item.description: documentations https://gohugo.io/getting-started/usage/ https://learn.netlify.com/en/ setup install hugo following offical install guide. download packages from Hugo Release and put executale file hugo in PATH. execute hugo new site sitename, To create a new site. directory structure will like this: . ├── archetypes ├── assets ├── config.toml ├── content ├── data ├── layouts ├── static └── themes download theme from github. unzip the archive and copy files to you site dir, overwriting directory and files of the same name.

item.title: Collection 1
item.description: Mesos 的资源分配，解释 mesos 的二级调度和资源邀约机制，并详细介绍了保证资源分配公平的DRF算法（主导资源公平算法 Dominant Resource Fairness）。 https://www.infoq.cn/article/analyse-mesos-part-04 bakup_url goroutine 调度器解析。 https://tonybai.com/2017/06/23/an-intro-about-goroutine-scheduler/ bakup_url 一致性哈希算法。 https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000013533592 bakup_url Kubernetes调度详解。 http://dockone.io/article/2885 bakup_url

item.title: 阿里云主机搭建 K8S 集群
